title: California wildfires live: Beyoncé contributes $2.5 million to relief fund - Hindustan Times
Leonardo DiCaprio, Vittoria Ceretti face backlash for evacuating from LA fires in private jet - Hindustan Times
summary:
Leonardo DiCaprio and Vittoria Ceretti Face Backlash for Evacuating LA Fires in Private Jet

Date: Jan 13, 2025

Source: Hindustan Times

Amid the ongoing wildfires in Los Angeles, actor Leonardo DiCaprio and his partner Vittoria Ceretti are receiving significant backlash for evacuating via private jet. Critics are questioning DiCaprio’s commitment to climate advocacy after his choice of transportation.

  • DiCaprio, known for his environmental activism, took a private jet to escape the fires.
  • The decision sparked outrage online, with many labeling him a hypocrite.
  • Critics highlighted the environmental impact of private jets, especially during a climate crisis.
  • Several celebrities have lost homes due to the wildfires, while others like Eva Longoria have contributed to relief efforts.
“The eco warrior shows his true colors! Never liked him. What a schmuck.”
“What a f*****g hypocrite.”

This incident highlights the contradiction between advocating for environmental sustainability and the actions taken in times of personal crisis.
newTitle: Leonardo DiCaprio and Vittoria Ceretti Face Backlash for Evacuating LA Fires in Private Jet

title: Amitabh Bahchan is shocked to learn his lookalike fooled fans, caused traffic jam: 'Hamare naam se kya kya ho raha hai' - Hindustan Times
summary:
Amitabh Bachchan Reacts to Lookalike Causing Traffic Jam

Date: Jan 13, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

Amitabh Bachchan was surprised to learn from a contestant on KBC 16 about a lookalike who not only fooled fans but also caused a traffic jam while posing as the star.

  • A contestant shared his experience meeting a doppelganger of Amitabh Bachchan.
  • The lookalike created a crowd and a traffic jam as fans believed Amitabh was present.
  • Bachchan humorously reacted by stating, "Hamare naam se na jaane kya kya ho raha hai" (What all is happening in my name).
  • Bachchan participated in KBC 16 and has had successful films in 2024.
“On meeting him, I felt I am actually meeting you, sir,” the contestant remarked.

This amusing incident highlights the impact of celebrity lookalikes on social behavior, reflecting both admiration and humor associated with Amitabh Bachchan.
newTitle: Amitabh Bachchan Reacts to Lookalike Causing Traffic Jam

title: Preity Zinta shares her family is ‘safe as of now’ amid LA wildfires: ‘I never thought I would live to see a day where…’ - The Indian Express
summary:

Date: January 12, 2025 Source: The Indian Express

Amid the raging wildfires in Los Angeles, Bollywood star Preity Zinta shared an update about her family's safety and expressed her heartbreak over the devastation around her.

  • Preity Zinta stated she is 'safe as of now' during the ongoing wildfires.
  • She expressed her emotional response to the fear and uncertainty the wildfires have caused.
  • Zinta thanked the firefighters and prayed for those affected by the fires.
  • Other celebrities, including Nora Fatehi and Priyanka Chopra, shared their experiences related to the wildfires.

I never thought I would live to see a day where fires would ravage neighbourhoods around us in LA, friends & families either evacuated or put on high alert.

The wildfires have impacted numerous people, including several Hollywood celebrities, leading to evacuation orders and significant property damage.
newTitle: Preity Zinta assures fans her family is safe amid LA wildfires

Date: January 13, 2025

Tamil actor Jayam Ravi has officially changed his name to Ravi Mohan as he embarks on a new chapter in his personal and professional life. Amid the release of his upcoming film, Kadhalikka Neramillai, he expressed his desire to be addressed by his new name and also announced the launch of his production banner and fan organization.

  • Ravi Mohan is set to be known by this name moving forward, aligning it with his aspirations.
  • He launched Ravi Mohan Studios, focusing on compelling narratives and nurturing new talent.
  • Ravi has formed the Ravi Mohan Fans Foundation to give back to the community.
  • He aims to positively impact society through this foundation's philanthropic efforts.
“Let’s make it a year of positivity, purpose, and progress.”

This transition marks not only a personal shift for the actor but also an expansion of his commitment to the film industry and the communities that support him.

title: Madha Gaja Raja Box Office Collection Day 2 - Sacnilk
Madha Gaja Raja Box Office Day 1: Vishal’s Film Makes 244% Higher Opening Than Vanangaan! - Koimoi
summary:
Madha Gaja Raja Box Office Day 1: Vishal’s Film Makes 244% Higher Opening Than Vanangaan!

Publication Date: January 12, 2025 Source: Koimoi

Tamil actor Vishal Krishna Reddy returns with his long-awaited sci-fi action comedy, Madha Gaja Raja, which finally released on January 12, 2025, during the Pongal holidays. The film, shot in 2012, faced significant delays but has now made a strong box office debut.

  • The film earned 3.10 crores on its opening day, achieving impressive numbers despite mixed reviews from critics.
  • It opened with 244% higher earnings compared to the recent release, Vanangaan, which only made 0.90 crores.
  • Last year's Pongal featured major releases like Captain Miller and Ayalaan, earning 8.50 crores and 4 crores respectively.
  • Madha Gaja Raja also stars Anjali, Varalaxmi Sarathkumar, and Sonu Sood among others.
“The film has finally arrived in theatres after a decade of struggles.”

As it stands, while Madha Gaja Raja is not far behind Ayalaan's earnings, it still trails significantly behind Captain Miller's success. There are hopes that positive word-of-mouth will enhance its performance during the festive period.
newTitle: Madha Gaja Raja Box Office Day 1: Vishal’s Film Makes 244% Higher Opening Than Vanangaan!

A behind-the-scenes video featuring Bollywood stars Varun Dhawan and Nargis Fakhri has gone viral, showing a comedic moment during the filming of the 2014 movie 'Main Tera Hero'.

  • Varun Dhawan's recent works include the film 'Baby John' and the web series 'Citadel: Honey Bunny.'
Nargis Fakhri: "I think I had the most fun with Varun Dhawan on set. He's just really full of energy and positivity and he's funny, so it's contagious."

The video has stirred a mix of reactions from fans, highlighting both criticism and admiration for the actors' playful interactions.

title: Game Changer Box Office Day 3 (All Languages): Beats Magadheera, Only 13 Crores Away From Becoming Ram Charan’s 2nd Highest Grossing Film! - Koimoi
summary:
Game Changer Box Office Day 3 (All Languages): Beats Magadheera, Only 13 Crores Away From Becoming Ram Charan's 2nd Highest Grossing Film

Date: January 13, 2024 | Source: Koimoi

Telugu political action thriller Game Changer has shown impressive box office performance over its first three days, exceeding the lifetime collections of the blockbuster Magadheera.

  • Day 1: 54 crores
  • Day 2: 22 crores
  • Day 3: 18 crores

Total: 94 crores

The downward trend continues

Though the opening was strong, the film has experienced a decline in box office collections, especially in Southern regions after Day 1.

“Game Changer made box office collection of 18 crores on Sunday, with 9.52 crores from the Hindi market alone.”

Ram Charan beats his own Magadheera

Magadheera previously held the record for highest grossing Telugu film. Now, Game Changer is positioned as Ram Charan’s third highest grosser.

Upcoming Milestone: Only 13 crores more needed to surpass Rangasthalam.

Stay tuned to Koimoi for more box office updates!
newTitle: Game Changer Box Office Day 3: Surpasses Magadheera Collections

title: Daaku Maharaaj Box Office Collections: Second biggest opening for a NBK film - PINKVILLA
summary:
Daaku Maharaaj Box Office Collections: Second biggest opening for a NBK film

Updated on Jan 13, 2025 | Source: Pinkvilla

Daaku Maharaaj recorded the second-biggest opening for an NBK starrer at the Indian box office, amassing approximately Rs. 26 crore. Despite an unconventional Sunday release, the film performed strongly, particularly in Andhra Pradesh.

  • The film grossed Rs. 23 crore in the Telugu states.
  • Had potential to surpass Rs. 30.25 crore if released solo.
  • Strong reception from audiences during the Sankranti period.
  • The film has good prospects ahead due to the rejection of competitors.
  • Opened well overseas with nearly USD 1 million on opening day in the United States.

The First Day Box Office Collections of Daaku Maharaaj are as follows:

Area Gross
AP/TS Rs. 23.00 cr.
Nizam Rs. 6.50 cr.
Ceded Rs. 5.25 cr.
Andhra Rs. 11.25 cr.
Karnataka Rs. 2.50 cr.
Tamil Nadu Rs. 0.25 cr.
Rest of India Rs. 0.25 cr.
INDIA Rs. 26.00 cr.
“The initial reception seems to be decent enough.”

In conclusion, Daaku Maharaaj's impressive opening indicates strong audience interest and highlights its potential for further financial success during the lucrative Sankranti period.
newTitle: Daaku Maharaaj Box Office Collections: Second biggest opening for a NBK film

title: Ben Affleck emotionally hugs and kisses daughter Violet's forehead after fleeing Palisades fire - Hindustan Times
summary:
As wildfires threaten Hollywood, Ben Affleck shares a touching embrace with his daughter, Violet, after a harrowing evacuation from his LA mansion.

Date: Jan 13, 2025

Source: Hindustan Times

Amid the terrifying backdrop of the Palisades Fire, actor Ben Affleck was photographed sharing a tender moment with his eldest daughter, Violet. After a hasty evacuation, Affleck was seen embracing his daughter in a warm, emotional hug, expressing relief as he returned to find his property unharmed.

  • Ben Affleck and daughter Violet had an emotional reunion after escaping the wildfires threatening their home.
  • The Palisades Fire has already claimed 16 lives and forced mass evacuations of several celebrity homes.
  • Affleck's property was spared from the devastation, and he expressed gratitude for his family's safety.
  • He has maintained regular contact with ex-wife Jennifer Lopez during the crisis.
  • Violet is preparing to return to Yale University for the spring semester.
“Ben’s home is still under evacuation order, but he feels so grateful his property is safe for the time being,” a source said.

The touching moment between Affleck and Violet highlights the personal toll of the wildfires, reminding us of the importance of family amidst crisis.
newTitle: Ben Affleck Shares Emotional Moment with Daughter Amidst California Wildfires
